item.title: About
item.description: Yoshihiko Ozaki (尾崎嘉彦) Engineer at GREE, Inc. yoshihiko.ozaki(at)gree.net Specified Concentrated Research Specialist at AI Research Center, AIST ozaki-y(at)aist.go.jp Research Interests Derivative-free and Black-box Optimization Automated Machine Learning (AutoML) Publications Journal Papers Yoshihiko Ozaki, Masaki Yano, and Masaki Onishi, “Effective hyperparameter optimization using Nelder-Mead method in deep learning,” IPSJ Transactions on Computer Vision and Applications, (2017) 9:20. Peer-Reviewed Conference Papers Yoshihiko Ozaki, Yuki Tanigaki, Shuhei Watanabe,
